assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LGS is the owner of Genetic Veterinary Sciences, Inc., DBA Paw Print Genetics which provides genetic testing on a fee-for-service basis. The remaining authors have no conflicts of interest to declare.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All canine samples included in this study were obtained through consent of the individual owners or were obtained from otherwise discarded DNA samples after clinical testing at Paw Print Genetics.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
